quote: Never talk to a client about architecture. Talk to him about his children. That is simply good politics. he will not understand what you have to say about architecture most of the time.
quote_letters: NEVER TALK TO A CLIENT ABOUT ARCHITECTURE TALK TO HIM ABOUT HIS CHILDREN THAT IS SIMPLY GOOD POLITICS HE WILL NOT UNDERSTAND WHAT YOU HAVE TO SAY ABOUT ARCHITECTURE MOST OF THE TIME
